org.restlet.ext.guice

Class SelfInjectingServerResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
        • org.restlet.ext.guice.SelfInjectingServerResource

  • public abstract class SelfInjectingServerResource
extends ServerResource
    Base class for ServerResources that do their own member injection.

    Tim Peierls
